casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

January, 1976

(January 9, 1976) Snyder Tank Corp., Appellant, v William Bernhardt et al., Respondents.

Judgment unanimously affirmed, with costs, on the opinion at Trial Term, Hanley, • J. (Appeal from judgment of Erie Supreme Court, in action for damages and injunction against former employee.) Present— Marsh, P. J., Moule, Mahoney, Goldman and Witmer, JJ.
